job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Webflow is a visual web development platform that empowers noncoders to create incredible experiences for the webltbrgtltbrgtWere adding a Data Scientist to our team to help inform the future of Webflow with data by building a deep understanding of how our customers create for the web with our product Youll partner directly with key product stakeholders to identify interesting business questions and provide the data and quantitative analysis to answer them leading the development of KPIs and helping teams understand how to improve our user experience As an early member of our data team you will also be working to improve our data warehouse by thoughtfully developing clean and reliable data pipelines for lasting impact We are looking for an empathetic humble curious and collaborative team member who is excited to provide meaningful actionable insight to teams at Webflow while helping to shape our foundational data capabilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtLocation San Francisco HQ or remote US timezoneltligtltligtFull timeltbrgtltligtltulgtAs a Data Scientist youllltbrgtltulgtltligtEnable our product teams with quantitative analysis to understand how customers engage with Webflow diving deep into impactful questions alongside key stakeholders and delivering actionable insightsltligtltligtAnalyze product and business success metrics monitoring and surfacing drivers of KPIs Key Performance Indicators ltligtltligtPartner with technical and nontechnical team members to execute experiments answer open ended business questions with data and research levers for improving our productltligtltligtDevelop our data foundation experimentation and machine learning capabilities contributing to pipelines and tools that scale to our connected complete understanding of our customer journey and improve our customer experience We currently use stitch dbt snowflake and Tableau and are working with our new data engineering team to dream big about our infrastructure and feedback loopsltbrgtltligtltulgtThat said these responsibilities are just the start At Webflow we encourage you to contribute wherever your interests take you  and shape your role accordingly And this isnt just a philosophical bent we actually give you 4 hours a week 10 of the work week to pursue passion projects outside of your role responsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout YoultbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYoull thrive as a ltstronggtData Scientistltstronggt if youltbrgtltulgtltligtHave demonstrated experience working as a Data Scientist or the equivalent in product analytics providing high quality reproducible analysis that impacts decision makingltligtltligtHave expertise in applied statistics eg predictive modeling hypothesis testing regressions segmentation and experimentation eg AB testing in an industry settingltligtltligtHave proficiency in SQL and experience with a programming language like Python or RltligtltligtThrive collaborating with product teams in a fastpaced and sometimes ambiguous environment solving complex and nuanced problemsltligtltligtEngage both technical and nontechnical audiences with clear and compelling communicationltbrgtltligtltulgtIf you dont meet 100 of the above qualifications you should still ltstronggtseriously consider applyingltstronggt Studies show that you can still be considered for a role if you meet just 50 of the roles requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt Webflow we believe that what were doing doesnt define our success  so we focus on our why and howltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur MissionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTo empower everyone to create for the web  and lead impactful fulfilling lives while we do itltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Core BehaviorsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtEarn customer trustltligtltligtGet it done do it rightltligtltligtPractice candor with careltligtltligtDream big ship oftenltbrgtltligtltulgtOur commitments to youltbrgtltulgtltligtWell pay you This is a fulltime salaried position that includes equityltligtltligtWell invest in your physical and mental wellbeing with health dental and vision benefits and a monthly stipend for health and wellness expenses ltligtltligtWell pay you to take a vacation  seriously Well give you a 1000 bonus for taking your first vacation with us that is more than 5 days ltligtltligtWe offer flexible parental leave ltligtltligtWe provide remote employees with the equipment they need to create a great remote work environment ltligtltligtWe will offer you the support you need to help you grow as an impactful Senior Data Scientist and a human being ltbrgtltligtltulgtReady to applyltbrgtltbrgtIf you share our values and enthusiasm for empowering the world wed love to review your application We promise we do take the time and care to review every application we receive However as much as we wish we could interview everyone who submits an application we cannot guarantee an interview or feedback due to the unprecedented volume of applications we are receiving today We are rooting for you and hope you do consider applying
